item.title: David add a quote by David James Poissant
David add a quote by David James Poissant
item.description: "Anyway, I'm done with God." Lily smiled. "But what if it's not God you're mad at?" she said. "What if the thing you're mad at is this idea of God, this really bad idea you got from other people. What if God exists? What if God is love? Aren't you going to feel stupid later?" -- David James Poissant

item.title: David add a quote by David James Poissant
item.description: "Most meals, I pay for myself so I can stock up on weeks Aaron goes a little crazy. His therapist calls this enabling. I call it love. She says I'm a problem, and I, for one, have agreed to disagree." -- David James Poissant

item.title: David add a quote by David James Poissant
item.description: "Aaron's therapist calls him a wounded bird, but, I ask you, who wouldn't care for a wounded bird? What kind of person sees a bird with a broken wing, cat on the horizon, and walks on by?" -- David James Poissant

item.title: David add a quote by David James Poissant
item.description: "She's thirty-four years old. In fifty, sixty years, she'll be dead, and everything reminds her of this fact but him. With Arnie, she imagines she might live forever." -- David James Poissant
